original_text: And ye shall smite every fenced city, and every choice city, and shall fell every good tree, and stop all wells of water, and mar every good piece of land with stones.
korean_text: 당신들이 모든 견고한 성읍과 모든 아름다운 성읍을 치고 모든 좋은 나무를 베고 모든 샘을 메우고 돌로 모든 좋은 밭을 헐리이다 하더니

sentences.original_text: And ye shall smite every fenced city
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 모든 견고한 성을 쳐부술 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall fell every good tree
and stop all wells of water
and mar every good piece of land with stones
sentences.korean_translation: 돌로 모든 좋은 땅을 망가뜨릴 것이다
